title: The paraphrase of Erasm[us] Roterdame vpon [the] epistle of sai[n]t Paule vnto his discyple Titus lately tra[n]slated into englysshe and fyrste a goodly prologue
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: Imprented by Ioh[a]n Byddell in London in Fletestrete next to the Flete Brydge],
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Title page has border (McKerrow and Ferguson 29) with Byddell's name in type in the sill.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
